Class ApprovalServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hcl.mediclaim.service.ApprovalServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ApprovalService

    @Service
public class ApprovalServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ApprovalService
    Since:
    2019-10-22 This class includes methods for viewing the pending requests and approving/rejecting a mediclaim request by approver/senior approver.
    Author:
    Balaji,KonReddy Charan

      • approveOrReject

        public com.hcl.mediclaim.dto.ResponseDto approveOrReject(com.hcl.mediclaim.dto.ApproveRequestDto approveRequestDto)
                                                  throws com.hcl.mediclaim.exception.MediClaimException,
                                                         javax.mail.MessagingException
        This method is used to approve/reject/pass the mediclaim request based on the action clicked by approver or senior approver in mediclaim management portal.
        Specified by:
        approveOrReject in interface ApprovalService
        Parameters:

        Throws:
